label: Coffee
definition: A hot drink made from the roasted and ground seeds (coffee beans) of a tropical shrub.

label: Soda
definition: Carbonated water (originally made with sodium bicarbonate) drunk alone or with liquor or wine.

label: Phone
definition: A piece of electronic equipment which makes it possible for you to speak to someone in another place who has similar equipment

label: Money
definition: A current medium of exchange in the form of coins and banknotes; coins and banknotes collectively.

label: Shoes
definition: A covering for the foot, typically made of leather, having a sturdy sole and not reaching above the ankle.
